content: times double_crochet in next 4 sts chain 4 single_crochet in chain 3 loop chain 4 join with slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet round 6 slip_stitch in next double_crochet in next chain 4 loop 2 times chain 4 skip next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 4 sts 2 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in chain 3 space* repeat *to* 2 times double_crochet in next 4 sts chain 4 single_crochet in next chain 4 loop twice chain 4 join with slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet round 7 in same space as join single_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next 5 sts 2 double_crochet in next chain 4 loop double_crochet in next 6 sts 2 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in chain 3 space* repeat *to* 2 times double_crochet in next 6 sts 2 double_crochet in chain 4 loop chain 4 single_crochet in next chain 4 loop chain 4 2 double_crochet in next chain 4 loop join with a slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet round 8 in same space as join single_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next 7 sts 2 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in chain 3 space corner made *double_crochet in next 10 sts 2 double_crochet in chain 4 loop chain 1 2 double_crochet in chain 4 loop double_crochet in next 10 sts 2 double_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in chain 3 space* repeat *to* 2 times double_crochet in next 10 sts 2 double_crochet in chain 4 loop chain 1 2 double_crochet in chain 4 loop double_crochet in last 2 sts join with slip_stitch in top of first double_crochet round 9 single_crochet in each st around including the chain 1 space and working 2 single_crochet chain 3 2 single_crochet in each corner chain 3 space join with a slip_stitch in beginning single_crochet and fasten_off ©destanywymore page 2 pattern chart/diagram special thanks to joyce herrmann for making this chart you can find her on ravelry with the username joycelovescrochet ©destanywymore page 3 feel free to sell gift or keep for yourself anything you make with this pattern if you do sell your pieces please use your own photos and give credit to destany wymore as the designer do not sell or distribute this pattern as your own in any way physically digitally or otherwise please link back to my ravelry store if you wish to share this pattern thank you enjoy ©destanywymore page 4
